            "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki",
            "text": "\\define timeline-title()\r\n<!-- Override this macro with a global macro \r\n     of the same name if you need to change \r\n     how titles are displayed on the timeline \r\n     -->\r\n<$view field=\"title\"/>\r\n\\end\r\n\\define timeline(limit:\"100\",format:\"DDth MMM YYYY\",subfilter:\"\",dateField:\"modified\")\r\n<div class=\"tc-timeline\">\r\n<$list filter=\"[!is[system]$subfilter$has[$dateField$]!sort[$dateField$]limit[$limit$]eachday[$dateField$]]\">\r\n<div class=\"tc-menu-list-item\">\r\n<$view field=\"$dateField$\" format=\"date\" template=\"$format$\"/>\r\n<$list filter=\"[sameday:$dateField${!!$dateField$}!is[system]$subfilter$!sort[$dateField$]]\">\r\n<div class=\"tc-menu-list-subitem\">\r\n<$link to={{!!title}}>\r\n<<timeline-title>>\r\n</$link>\r\n</div>\r\n</$list>\r\n</div>\r\n</$list>\r\n</div>\r\n\\end\r\n"
        },
        "$:/core/macros/toc": {
            "title": "$:/core/macros/toc",
            "tags": "$:/tags/Macro",
            "text": "\\define toc-caption()\r\n<$set name=\"tv-wikilinks\" value=\"no\">\r\n<$transclude field=\"caption\">\r\n<$view field=\"title\"/>\r\n</$transclude>\r\n</$set>\r\n\\end\n\n\\define toc-body(rootTag,tag,sort:\"\",itemClassFilter)\r\n<ol class=\"tc-toc\">\r\n<$list filter=\"\"\"[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$tag$]!has[draft.of]$sort$]\"\"\">\r\n<$set name=\"toc-item-class\" filter=\"\"\"$itemClassFilter$\"\"\" value=\"toc-item-selected\" emptyValue=\"toc-item\">\r\n<li class=<<toc-item-class>>>\r\n<$list filter=\"[all[current]toc-link[no]]\" emptyMessage=\"<$link><$view field='caption'><$view field='title'/></$view></$link>\">\r\n<<toc-caption>>\r\n</$list>\r\n<$list filter=\"\"\"[all[current]] -[[$rootTag$]]\"\"\">\r\n<$macrocall $name=\"toc-body\" rootTag=\"\"\"$rootTag$\"\"\" tag=<<currentTiddler>> sort=\"\"\"$sort$\"\"\" itemClassFilter=\"\"\"$itemClassFilter$\"\"\"/>\r\n</$list>\r\n</li>\r\n</$set>\r\n</$list>\r\n</ol>\r\n\\end\n\n\\define toc(tag,sort:\"\",itemClassFilter)\r\n<<toc-body rootTag:\"\"\"$tag$\"\"\" tag:\"\"\"$tag$\"\"\" sort:\"\"\"$sort$\"\"\" itemClassFilter:\"\"\"itemClassFilter\"\"\">>\r\n\\end\n\n\\define toc-linked-expandable-body(tag,sort:\"\",itemClassFilter)\r\n<$set name=\"toc-state\" value=<<qualify \"$:/state/toc/$tag$-$(currentTiddler)$\">>>\r\n<$set name=\"toc-item-class\" filter=\"\"\"$itemClassFilter$\"\"\" value=\"toc-item-selected\" emptyValue=\"toc-item\">\r\n<li class=<<toc-item-class>>>\r\n<$link>\r\n<$reveal type=\"nomatch\" state=<<toc-state>> text=\"open\">\r\n<$button set=<<toc-state>> setTo=\"open\" class=\"tc-btn-invisible\">\r\n{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}\r\n</$button>\r\n</$reveal>\r\n<$reveal type=\"match\" state=<<toc-state>> text=\"open\">\r\n<$button set=<<toc-state>> setTo=\"close\" class=\"tc-btn-invisible\">\r\n{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}}\r\n</$button>\r\n</$reveal>\r\n<<toc-caption>>\r\n</$link>\r\n<$reveal type=\"match\" state=<<toc-state>> text=\"open\">\r\n<$macrocall $name=\"toc-expandable\" tag=<<currentTiddler>> sort=\"\"\"$sort$\"\"\" itemClassFilter=\"\"\"$itemClassFilter$\"\"\"/>\r\n</$reveal>\r\n</li>\r\n</$set>\r\n</$set>\r\n\\end\n\n\\define toc-unlinked-expandable-body(tag,sort:\"\",itemClassFilter)\r\n<$set name=\"toc-state\" value=<<qualify \"$:/state/toc/$tag$-$(currentTiddler)$\">>>\r\n<$set name=\"toc-item-class\" filter=\"\"\"$itemClassFilter$\"\"\" value=\"toc-item-selected\" emptyValue=\"toc-item\">\r\n<li class=<<toc-item-class>>>\r\n<$reveal type=\"nomatch\" state=<<toc-state>> text=\"open\">\r\n<$button set=<<toc-state>> setTo=\"open\" class=\"tc-btn-invisible\">\r\n{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}\r\n<<toc-caption>>\r\n</$button>\r\n</$reveal>\r\n<$reveal type=\"match\" state=<<toc-state>> text=\"open\">\r\n<$button set=<<toc-state>> setTo=\"close\" class=\"tc-btn-invisible\">\r\n{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}}\r\n<<toc-caption>>\r\n</$button>\r\n</$reveal>\r\n<$reveal type=\"match\" state=<<toc-state>> text=\"open\">\r\n<$macrocall $name=\"toc-expandable\" tag=<<currentTiddler>> sort=\"\"\"$sort$\"\"\" itemClassFilter=\"\"\"$itemClassFilter$\"\"\"/>\r\n</$reveal>\r\n</li>\r\n</$set>\r\n</$set>\r\n\\end\n\n\\define toc-expandable(tag,sort:\"\",itemClassFilter)\r\n<ol class=\"tc-toc toc-expandable\">\r\n<$list filter=\"[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$tag$]!has[draft.of]$sort$]\">\r\n<$list filter=\"[all[current]toc-link[no]]\" emptyMessage=\"<<toc-linked-expandable-body tag:'$tag$' sort:'$sort$' itemClassFilter:'$itemClassFilter$'>>\">\r\n<<toc-unlinked-expandable-body tag:\"\"\"$tag$\"\"\" sort:\"\"\"$sort$\"\"\" itemClassFilter:\"\"\"itemClassFilter\"\"\">>\r\n</$list>\r\n</$list>\r\n</ol>\r\n\\end\n\n\\define toc-linked-selective-expandable-body(tag,sort:\"\",itemClassFilter)\r\n<$set name=\"toc-state\" value=<<qualify \"$:/state/toc/$tag$-$(currentTiddler)$\">>>\r\n<$set name=\"toc-item-class\" filter=\"\"\"$itemClassFilter$\"\"\" value=\"toc-item-selected\" emptyValue=\"toc-item\">\r\n<li class=<<toc-item-class>>>\r\n<$link>\r\n<$list filter=\"[all[current]tagging[]limit[1]]\" variable=\"ignore\" emptyMessage=\"<$button class='tc-btn-invisible'>{{$:/core/images/blank}}</$button>\">\r\n<$reveal type=\"nomatch\" state=<<toc-state>> text=\"open\">\r\n<$button set=<<toc-state>> setTo=\"open\" class=\"tc-btn-invisible\">\r\n{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}\r\n</$button>\r\n</$reveal>\r\n<$reveal type=\"match\" state=<<toc-state>> text=\"open\">\r\n<$button set=<<toc-state>> setTo=\"close\" class=\"tc-btn-invisible\">\r\n{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}}\r\n</$button>\r\n</$reveal>\r\n</$list>\r\n<<toc-caption>>\r\n</$link>\r\n<$reveal type=\"match\" state=<<toc-state>> text=\"open\">\r\n<$macrocall $name=\"toc-selective-expandable\" tag=<<currentTiddler>> sort=\"\"\"$sort$\"\"\" itemClassFilter=\"\"\"$itemClassFilter$\"\"\"/>\r\n</$reveal>\r\n</li>\r\n</$set>\r\n</$set>\r\n\\end\n\n\\define toc-unlinked-selective-expandable-body(tag,sort:\"\",itemClassFilter)\r\n<$set name=\"toc-state\" value=<<qualify \"$:/state/toc/$tag$-$(currentTiddler)$\">>>\r\n<$set name=\"toc-item-class\" filter=\"\"\"$itemClassFilter$\"\"\" value=\"toc-item-selected\" emptyValue=\"toc-item\">\r\n<li class=<<toc-item-class>>>\r\n<$list filter=\"[all[current]tagging[]limit[1]]\" variable=\"ignore\" emptyMessage=\"<$button class='tc-btn-invisible'>{{$:/core/images/blank}}</$button> <$view field='caption'><$view field='title'/></$view>\">\r\n<$reveal type=\"nomatch\" state=<<toc-state>> text=\"open\">\r\n<$button set=<<toc-state>> setTo=\"open\" class=\"tc-btn-invisible\">\r\n{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}\r\n<<toc-caption>>\r\n</$button>\r\n</$reveal>\r\n<$reveal type=\"match\" state=<<toc-state>> text=\"open\">\r\n<$button set=<<toc-state>> setTo=\"close\" class=\"tc-btn-invisible\">\r\n{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}}\r\n<<toc-caption>>\r\n</$button>\r\n</$reveal>\r\n</$list>\r\n<$reveal type=\"match\" state=<<toc-state>> text=\"open\">\r\n<$macrocall $name=\"\"\"toc-selective-expandable\"\"\" tag=<<currentTiddler>> sort=\"\"\"$sort$\"\"\" itemClassFilter=\"\"\"$itemClassFilter$\"\"\"/>\r\n</$reveal>\r\n</li>\r\n</$set>\r\n</$set>\r\n\\end\n\n\\define toc-selective-expandable(tag,sort:\"\",itemClassFilter)\r\n<ol class=\"tc-toc toc-selective-expandable\">\r\n<$list filter=\"[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$tag$]!has[draft.of]$sort$]\">\r\n<$list filter=\"[all[current]toc-link[no]]\" variable=\"ignore\" emptyMessage=\"<<toc-linked-selective-expandable-body tag:'$tag$' sort:'$sort$' itemClassFilter:'$itemClassFilter$'>>\">\r\n<<toc-unlinked-selective-expandable-body tag:\"\"\"$tag$\"\"\" sort:\"\"\"$sort$\"\"\" itemClassFilter:\"\"\"$itemClassFilter$\"\"\">>\r\n</$list>\r\n</$list>\r\n</ol>\r\n\\end\n\n\\define toc-tabbed-selected-item-filter(selectedTiddler)\r\n[all[current]field:title{$selectedTiddler$}]\r\n\\end\n\n\\define toc-tabbed-external-nav(tag,sort:\"\",selectedTiddler:\"$:/temp/toc/selectedTiddler\",unselectedText,missingText,template:\"\")\r\n<$tiddler tiddler={{$selectedTiddler$}}>\r\n<div class=\"tc-tabbed-table-of-contents\">\r\n<$linkcatcher to=\"$selectedTiddler$\">\r\n<div class=\"tc-table-of-contents\">\r\n<$macrocall $name=\"toc-selective-expandable\" tag=\"\"\"$tag$\"\"\" sort=\"\"\"$sort$\"\"\" itemClassFilter=<<toc-tabbed-selected-item-filter selectedTiddler:\"\"\"$selectedTiddler$\"\"\">>/>\r\n</div>\r\n</$linkcatcher>\r\n<div class=\"tc-tabbed-table-of-contents-content\">\r\n<$reveal state=\"\"\"$selectedTiddler$\"\"\" type=\"nomatch\" text=\"\">\r\n<$transclude mode=\"block\" tiddler=\"$template$\">\r\n<h1><<toc-caption>></h1>\r\n<$transclude mode=\"block\">$missingText$</$transclude>\r\n</$transclude>\r\n</$reveal>\r\n<$reveal state=\"\"\"$selectedTiddler$\"\"\" type=\"match\" text=\"\">\r\n$unselectedText$\r\n</$reveal>\r\n</div>\r\n</div>\r\n</$tiddler>\r\n\\end\n\n\\define toc-tabbed-internal-nav(tag,sort:\"\",selectedTiddler:\"$:/temp/toc/selectedTiddler\",unselectedText,missingText,template:\"\")\r\n<$linkcatcher to=\"\"\"$selectedTiddler$\"\"\">\r\n<$macrocall $name=\"toc-tabbed-external-nav\" tag=\"\"\"$tag$\"\"\" sort=\"\"\"$sort$\"\"\" selectedTiddler=\"\"\"$selectedTiddler$\"\"\" unselectedText=\"\"\"$unselectedText$\"\"\" missingText=\"\"\"$missingText$\"\"\" template=\"\"\"$template$\"\"\"/>\r\n</$linkcatcher>\r\n\\end\n\n"
        },
        "$:/snippets/minilanguageswitcher": {
            "title": "$:/snippets/minilanguageswitcher",
            "text": "<$select tiddler=\"$:/language\">\r\n<$list filter=\"[[$:/languages/en-GB]] [plugin-type[language]sort[title]]\">\r\n<option value=<<currentTiddler>>><$view field=\"description\"><$view field=\"name\"><$view field=\"title\"/></$view></$view></option>\r\n</$list>\r\n</$select>"
        },
        "$:/snippets/minithemeswitcher": {
            "title": "$:/snippets/minithemeswitcher",
            "text": "\\define lingo-base() $:/language/ControlPanel/Theme/\r\n<<lingo Prompt>> <$select tiddler=\"$:/theme\">\r\n<$list filter=\"[plugin-type[theme]sort[title]]\">\r\n<option value=<<currentTiddler>>><$view field=\"name\"><$view field=\"title\"/></$view></option>\r\n</$list>\r\n</$select>"
        },
        "$:/snippets/modules": {
            "title": "$:/snippets/modules",
            "text": "\\define describeModuleType(type)\r\n{{$:/language/Docs/ModuleTypes/$type$}}\r\n\\end\r\n<$list filter=\"[moduletypes[]]\">\n\n!! <$macrocall $name=\"currentTiddler\" $type=\"text/plain\" $output=\"text/plain\"/>\n\n<$macrocall $name=\"describeModuleType\" type=<<currentTiddler>>/>\n\n<ul><$list filter=\"[all[current]modules[]]\"><li><$link><<currentTiddler>></$link>\r\n</li>\r\n</$list>\r\n</ul>\r\n</$list>\r\n"
        },
        "$:/palette": {
            "title": "$:/palette",
            "text": "$:/palettes/Vanilla"
        },
        "$:/snippets/paletteeditor": {
            "title": "$:/snippets/paletteeditor",
            "text": "\\define lingo-base() $:/language/ControlPanel/Palette/Editor/\r\n\\define describePaletteColour(colour)\r\n<$transclude tiddler=\"$:/language/Docs/PaletteColours/$colour$\"><$text text=\"$colour$\"/></$transclude>\r\n\\end\r\n<$set name=\"currentTiddler\" value={{$:/palette}}>\n\n<<lingo Prompt>> <$link to={{$:/palette}}><$macrocall $name=\"currentTiddler\" $output=\"text/plain\"/></$link>\n\n<$list filter=\"[all[current]is[shadow]is[tiddler]]\" variable=\"listItem\">\r\n<<lingo Prompt/Modified>>\r\n<$button message=\"tm-delete-tiddler\" param={{$:/palette}}><<lingo Reset/Caption>></$button>\r\n</$list>\n\n<$list filter=\"[all[current]is[shadow]!is[tiddler]]\" variable=\"listItem\">\r\n<<lingo Clone/Prompt>>\r\n</$list>\n\n<$button message=\"tm-new-tiddler\" param={{$:/palette}}><<lingo Clone/Caption>></$button>\n\n<table>\r\n<tbody>\r\n<$list filter=\"[all[current]indexes[]]\" variable=\"colourName\">\r\n<tr>\r\n<td>\r\n''<$macrocall $name=\"describePaletteColour\" colour=<<colourName>>/>''<br/>\r\n<$macrocall $name=\"colourName\" $output=\"text/plain\"/>\r\n</td>\r\n<td>\r\n<$edit-text index=<<colourName>> tag=\"input\"/>\r\n<br>\r\n<$edit-text index=<<colourName>> type=\"color\" tag=\"input\"/>\r\n</td>\r\n</tr>\r\n</$list>\r\n</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n</$set>\r\n"
        },
        "$:/snippets/palettepreview": {
            "title": "$:/snippets/palettepreview",
            "text": "<$set name=\"currentTiddler\" value={{$:/palette}}>\r\n<$transclude tiddler=\"$:/snippets/currpalettepreview\"/>\r\n</$set>\r\n"
        },
        "$:/snippets/paletteswitcher": {
            "title": "$:/snippets/paletteswitcher",
            "text": "\\define lingo-base() $:/language/ControlPanel/Palette/\r\n<div class=\"tc-prompt\">\r\n<<lingo Prompt>> <$view tiddler={{$:/palette}} field=\"name\"/>\r\n</div>\n\n<$linkcatcher to=\"$:/palette\">\r\n<div class=\"tc-chooser\"><$list filter=\"[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Palette]sort[description]]\"><div class=\"tc-chooser-item\"><$link to={{!!title}}><div><$reveal state=\"$:/palette\" type=\"match\" text={{!!title}}>&bull;</$reveal><$reveal state=\"$:/palette\" type=\"nomatch\" text={{!!title}}>&nbsp;</$reveal> ''<$view field=\"name\" format=\"text\"/>'' - <$view field=\"description\" format=\"text\"/></div><$transclude tiddler=\"$:/snippets/currpalettepreview\"/></$link></div>\r\n</$list>\r\n</div>\r\n</$linkcatcher>"
        },
        "$:/temp/search": {
            "title": "$:/temp/search",
            "text": ""
        },
        "$:/tags/AdvancedSearch": {
            "title": "$:/tags/AdvancedSearch",
            "list": "[[$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Standard]] [[$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/System]] [[$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Shadows]] [[$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter]]"
        },
        "$:/tags/ControlPanel": {

        },

        },

        },
        "$:/tags/TiddlerInfo": {
            "title": "$:/tags/TiddlerInfo",
            "list": "[[$:/core/ui/TiddlerInfo/Tools]] [[$:/core/ui/TiddlerInfo/References]] [[$:/core/ui/TiddlerInfo/Tagging]] [[$:/core/ui/TiddlerInfo/List]] [[$:/core/ui/TiddlerInfo/Listed]] [[$:/core/ui/TiddlerInfo/Fields]]",

        },
        "$:/tags/TiddlerInfo/Advanced": {

        },
        "$:/tags/ViewTemplate": {
            "title": "$:/tags/ViewTemplate",
            "list": "[[$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/title]] [[$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/unfold]] [[$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle]] [[$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags]] [[$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/classic]] [[$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/body]]"
        },
        "$:/tags/ViewToolbar": {
            "title": "$:/tags/ViewToolbar",
            "list": "[[$:/core/ui/Buttons/more-tiddler-actions]] [[$:/core/ui/Buttons/info]] [[$:/core/ui/Buttons/new-here]] [[$:/core/ui/Buttons/new-journal-here]] [[$:/core/ui/Buttons/clone]] [[$:/core/ui/Buttons/export-tiddler]] [[$:/core/ui/Buttons/edit]] [[$:/core/ui/Buttons/delete]] [[$:/core/ui/Buttons/permalink]] [[$:/core/ui/Buttons/permaview]] [[$:/core/ui/Buttons/open-window]] [[$:/core/ui/Buttons/close-others]] [[$:/core/ui/Buttons/close]] [[$:/core/ui/Buttons/fold-others]] [[$:/core/ui/Buttons/fold]]"
        },
        "$:/snippets/themeswitcher": {
            "title": "$:/snippets/themeswitcher",
            "text": "\\define lingo-base() $:/language/ControlPanel/Theme/\r\n<<lingo Prompt>> <$view tiddler={{$:/theme}} field=\"name\"/>\n\n<$linkcatcher to=\"$:/theme\">\r\n<$list filter=\"[plugin-type[theme]sort[title]]\"><div><$reveal state=\"$:/theme\" type=\"match\" text={{!!title}}>&bull;</$reveal><$reveal state=\"$:/theme\" type=\"nomatch\" text={{!!title}}>&nbsp;</$reveal> <$link to={{!!title}}>''<$view field=\"name\" format=\"text\"/>'' <$view field=\"description\" format=\"text\"/></$link></div>\r\n</$list>\r\n</$linkcatcher>"
        },
        "$:/core/wiki/title": {
            "title": "$:/core/wiki/title",
            "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki",
            "text": "{{$:/SiteTitle}} --- {{$:/SiteSubtitle}}"
        },
        "$:/view": {
            "title": "$:/view",
            "text": "classic"
        },
        "$:/snippets/viewswitcher": {
            "title": "$:/snippets/viewswitcher",
            "text": "\\define lingo-base() $:/language/ControlPanel/StoryView/\r\n<<lingo Prompt>> <$select tiddler=\"$:/view\">\r\n<$list filter=\"[storyviews[]]\">\r\n<option><$view field=\"title\"/></option>\r\n</$list>\r\n</$select>"
        }
    }
}
/*\
title: $:/core/modules/widgets/list.js
type: application/javascript
module-type: widget

List and list item widgets

\*/
(function(){

/*jslint node: true, browser: true */
/*global $tw: false */
"use strict";

var Widget = require("$:/core/modules/widgets/widget.js").widget;

/*
The list widget creates list element sub-widgets that reach back into the list widget for their configuration
*/

var ListWidget = function(parseTreeNode,options) {
	// Initialise the storyviews if they've not been done already
	if(!this.storyViews) {
		ListWidget.prototype.storyViews = {};
		$tw.modules.applyMethods("storyview",this.storyViews);
	}
	// Main initialisation inherited from widget.js
	this.initialise(parseTreeNode,options);
};

/*
Inherit from the base widget class
*/
ListWidget.prototype = new Widget();

/*
Render this widget into the DOM
*/
ListWidget.prototype.render = function(parent,nextSibling) {
	this.parentDomNode = parent;
	this.computeAttributes();
	this.execute();
	this.renderChildren(parent,nextSibling);
	// Construct the storyview
	var StoryView = this.storyViews[this.storyViewName];
	if(StoryView && !this.document.isTiddlyWikiFakeDom) {
		this.storyview = new StoryView(this);
	} else {
		this.storyview = null;
	}
};

/*
Compute the internal state of the widget
*/
ListWidget.prototype.execute = function() {
	// Get our attributes
	this.template = this.getAttribute("template");
	this.editTemplate = this.getAttribute("editTemplate");
	this.variableName = this.getAttribute("variable","currentTiddler");
	this.storyViewName = this.getAttribute("storyview");
	this.historyTitle = this.getAttribute("history");
	this.iterator = this.getAttribute("iterator","iterator");
	// Compose the list elements
	this.list = this.getTiddlerList();
	var members = [],
		self = this,
		count = self.list.length;
	// Check for an empty list
	if(0 === count) {
		members = this.getEmptyMessage();
	} else {
		$tw.utils.each(this.list,function(title,index) {
			members.push(self.makeItemTemplate(title, index, count, self.iterator));
		});
	}
	// Construct the child widgets
	this.makeChildWidgets(members);
	// Clear the last history
	this.history = [];
};

ListWidget.prototype.getTiddlerList = function() {
	var defaultFilter = "[!is[system]sort[title]]";
	return this.wiki.filterTiddlers(this.getAttribute("filter",defaultFilter),this);
};

ListWidget.prototype.getEmptyMessage = function() {
	var emptyMessage = this.getAttribute("emptyMessage",""),
		parser = this.wiki.parseText("text/vnd.tiddlywiki",emptyMessage,{parseAsInline: true});
	if(parser) {
		return parser.tree;
	} else {
		return [];
	}
};

/*
Compose the template for a list item
*/
ListWidget.prototype.makeItemTemplate = function(title, index, count, iterator) {
	// Check if the tiddler is a draft
	var tiddler = this.wiki.getTiddler(title),
		isDraft = tiddler && tiddler.hasField("draft.of"),
		template = this.template,
		templateTree;
	if(isDraft && this.editTemplate) {
		template = this.editTemplate;
	}
	// Compose the transclusion of the template
	if(template) {
		templateTree = [{type: "transclude", attributes: {tiddler: {type: "string", value: template}}}];
	} else {
		if(this.parseTreeNode.children && this.parseTreeNode.children.length > 0) {
			templateTree = this.parseTreeNode.children;
		} else {
			// Default template is a link to the title
			templateTree = [{type: "element", tag: this.parseTreeNode.isBlock ? "div" : "span", children: [{type: "link", attributes: {to: {type: "string", value: title}}, children: [
					{type: "text", text: title}
			]}]}];
		}
	}
	// Return the list item
	return {
		type: "listitem",
		itemTitle: title,
		variableName: this.variableName,
		children: templateTree,
		index: index,
		count: count,
		iterator: iterator
	};
};

/*
Selectively refreshes the widget if needed. Returns true if the widget or any of its children needed re-rendering
*/
ListWidget.prototype.refresh = function(changedTiddlers) {
	var changedAttributes = this.computeAttributes();
	// Completely refresh if any of our attributes have changed
	if(changedAttributes.filter || changedAttributes.template || changedAttributes.editTemplate || changedAttributes.emptyMessage || changedAttributes.storyview || changedAttributes.history) {
		this.refreshSelf();
		return true;
	} else {
		// Handle any changes to the list
		var hasChanged = this.handleListChanges(changedTiddlers);
		// Handle any changes to the history stack
		if(this.historyTitle && changedTiddlers[this.historyTitle]) {
			this.handleHistoryChanges();
		}
		return hasChanged;
	}
};

/*
Handle any changes to the history list
*/
ListWidget.prototype.handleHistoryChanges = function() {
	// Get the history data
	var newHistory = this.wiki.getTiddlerData(this.historyTitle,[]);
	// Ignore any entries of the history that match the previous history
	var entry = 0;
	while(entry < newHistory.length && entry < this.history.length && newHistory[entry].title === this.history[entry].title) {
		entry++;
	}
	// Navigate forwards to each of the new tiddlers
	while(entry < newHistory.length) {
		if(this.storyview && this.storyview.navigateTo) {
			this.storyview.navigateTo(newHistory[entry]);
		}
		entry++;
	}
	// Update the history
	this.history = newHistory;
};

/*
Process any changes to the list
*/
ListWidget.prototype.handleListChanges = function(changedTiddlers) {
	// Get the new list
	var prevList = this.list;
	this.list = this.getTiddlerList();
	// Check for an empty list
	if(this.list.length === 0) {
		// Check if it was empty before
		if(prevList.length === 0) {
			// If so, just refresh the empty message
			return this.refreshChildren(changedTiddlers);
		} else {
			// Replace the previous content with the empty message
			for(t=this.children.length-1; t>=0; t--) {
				this.removeListItem(t);
			}
			var nextSibling = this.findNextSiblingDomNode();
			this.makeChildWidgets(this.getEmptyMessage());
			this.renderChildren(this.parentDomNode,nextSibling);
			return true;
		}
	} else {
		// If the list was empty then we need to remove the empty message
		if(prevList.length === 0) {
			this.removeChildDomNodes();
			this.children = [];
		}
		// Cycle through the list, inserting and removing list items as needed
		var hasRefreshed = false;
		for(var t=0; t<this.list.length; t++) {
			var index = this.findListItem(t,this.list[t]);
			if(index === undefined) {
				// The list item must be inserted
				this.insertListItem(t,this.list[t]);
				hasRefreshed = true;
			} else {
				// There are intervening list items that must be removed
				for(var n=index-1; n>=t; n--) {
					this.removeListItem(n);
					hasRefreshed = true;
				}
				// Refresh the item we're reusing
				var refreshed = this.children[t].refresh(changedTiddlers);
				hasRefreshed = hasRefreshed || refreshed;
			}
		}
		// Remove any left over items
		for(t=this.children.length-1; t>=this.list.length; t--) {
			this.removeListItem(t);
			hasRefreshed = true;
		}
		return hasRefreshed;
	}
};

/*
Find the list item with a given title, starting from a specified position
*/
ListWidget.prototype.findListItem = function(startIndex,title) {
	while(startIndex < this.children.length) {
		if(this.children[startIndex].parseTreeNode.itemTitle === title) {
			return startIndex;
		}
		startIndex++;
	}
	return undefined;
};

/*
Insert a new list item at the specified index
*/
ListWidget.prototype.insertListItem = function(index,title) {
	// Create, insert and render the new child widgets
	var widget = this.makeChildWidget(this.makeItemTemplate(title));
	widget.parentDomNode = this.parentDomNode; // Hack to enable findNextSiblingDomNode() to work
	this.children.splice(index,0,widget);
	var nextSibling = widget.findNextSiblingDomNode();
	widget.render(this.parentDomNode,nextSibling);
	// Animate the insertion if required
	if(this.storyview && this.storyview.insert) {
		this.storyview.insert(widget);
	}
	return true;
};

/*
Remove the specified list item
*/
ListWidget.prototype.removeListItem = function(index) {
	var widget = this.children[index];
	// Animate the removal if required
	if(this.storyview && this.storyview.remove) {
		this.storyview.remove(widget);
	} else {
		widget.removeChildDomNodes();
	}
	// Remove the child widget
	this.children.splice(index,1);
};

exports.list = ListWidget;

var ListItemWidget = function(parseTreeNode,options) {
	this.initialise(parseTreeNode,options);
};

/*
Inherit from the base widget class
*/
ListItemWidget.prototype = new Widget();

/*
Render this widget into the DOM
*/
ListItemWidget.prototype.render = function(parent,nextSibling) {
	this.parentDomNode = parent;
	this.computeAttributes();
	this.execute();
	this.renderChildren(parent,nextSibling);
};

/*
Compute the internal state of the widget
*/
ListItemWidget.prototype.execute = function() {
	var item = this.parseTreeNode;
	// Set the current list item title
	this.setVariable(item.variableName,item.itemTitle);
	this.setVariable(item.iterator,(item.index + 1).toString());
	this.setVariable(item.iterator + "-even",item.index % 2 == 1 ? 'true' : '');
	this.setVariable(item.iterator + "-last",item.index + 1 == item.count ? 'true' : '');

	// Construct the child widgets
	this.makeChildWidgets();
};

/*
Selectively refreshes the widget if needed. Returns true if the widget or any of its children needed re-rendering
*/
ListItemWidget.prototype.refresh = function(changedTiddlers) {
	return this.refreshChildren(changedTiddlers);
};

exports.listitem = ListItemWidget;

})();

</$link>
\end

        }

{
    "tiddlers": {
        "$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/base": {
            "title": "$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/base",
            "tags": "[[$:/tags/Stylesheet]]",
            "text": "\\define custom-background-datauri()\r\n<$set name=\"background\" value={{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/backgroundimage}}>\r\n<$list filter=\"[<background>is[image]]\">\r\n`background: url(`\r\n<$list filter=\"[<background>!has[_canonical_uri]]\">\r\n<$macrocall $name=\"datauri\" button-background>>;\r\n\tborder-color: <<colour button-border>>;\r\n}\n\n/*\r\n** Basic element styles\r\n*/\n\nhtml {\r\n\tfont-family: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/fontfamily}};\r\n\ttext-rendering: optimizeLegibility; /* Enables kerning and ligatures etc. */\r\n\t-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;\r\n\t-moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;\r\n}\n\nhtml:-webkit-full-screen {\r\n\tbackground-color: <<colour page-background>>;\r\n}\n\nbody.tc-body {\r\n\tfont-size: 1em;\r\n}\n\n.tc-plugin-info-dropdown {\r\n\tborder: 1px solid <<colour muted-foreground>>;\r\n\tmargin-top: -8px;\r\n}\n\n.tc-plugin-info-dropdown-message {\r\n\tbackground: <<colour message-background>>;\r\n\tpadding: 0.5em 1em 0.5em 1em;\r\n\tfont-weight: bold;\r\n\tfont-size: 0.8em;\r\n}\n\n.tc-plugin-info-dropdown-body {\r\n\tpadding: 1em 1em 1em 1em;\r\n}\n\n/*\r\n** Message boxes\r\n*/\n\n.tc-message-box {\r\n\tborder: 1px solid <<colour message-border>>;\r\n\tbackground: <<colour message-background>>;\r\n\tpadding: 0px 21px 0px 21px;\r\n\tfont-size: 12px;\r\n\tline-height: 18px;\r\n\tcolor: <<colour message-foreground>>;\r\n}\n\n/*\r\n** Pictures\r\n*/\n\n.tc-bordered-image {\r\n\tborder: 1px solid <<colour muted-foreground>>;\r\n\tpadding: 5px;\r\n\tmargin: 5px;\r\n}\n\n/*\r\n** Floats\r\n*/\n\n.tc-float-right {\r\n\tfloat: right;\r\n}\n\n/*\r\n** Chooser\r\n*/\n\n.tc-chooser {\r\n\tborder: 1px solid <<colour table-border>>;\r\n}\n\n.tc-chooser-item {\r\n\tborder: 8px;\r\n\tpadding: 2px 4px;\r\n}\n\n.tc-chooser-item a.tc-tiddlylink {\r\n\tdisplay: block;\r\n\ttext-decoration: none;\r\n\tcolor: <<colour tiddler-link-foreground>>;\r\n\tbackground-color: <<colour tiddler-link-background>>;\r\n}\n\n.tc-chooser-item a.tc-tiddlylink:hover {\r\n\ttext-decoration: none;\r\n\tcolor: <<colour tiddler-link-background>>;\r\n\tbackground-color: <<colour tiddler-link-foreground>>;\r\n}\n\n/*\r\n** Palette swatches\r\n*/\n\n.tc-swatches-horiz {\r\n}\n\n.tc-swatches-horiz .tc-swatch {\r\n\tdisplay: inline-block;\r\n}\n\n.tc-swatch {\r\n\twidth: 2em;\r\n\theight: 2em;\r\n\tmargin: 0.4em;\r\n\tborder: 1px solid #888;\r\n}\n\n/*\r\n** Table of contents\r\n*/\n\n.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-table-of-contents {\r\n\twhite-space: nowrap;\r\n}\n\n.tc-table-of-contents button {\r\n\tcolor: <<colour sidebar-foreground>>;\r\n}\n\n.tc-table-of-contents svg {\r\n\twidth: 0.7em;\r\n\theight: 0.7em;\r\n\tvertical-align: middle;\r\n\tfill: <<colour sidebar-foreground>>;\r\n}\n\n.tc-table-of-contents ol {\r\n\tlist-style-type: none;\r\n\tpadding-left: 0;\r\n}\n\n.tc-table-of-contents ol ol {\r\n\tpadding-left: 1em;\r\n}\n\n.tc-table-of-contents li {\r\n\tfont-size: 1.0em;\r\n\tfont-weight: bold;\r\n}\n\n.tc-table-of-contents li a {\r\n\tfont-weight: bold;\r\n}\n\n.tc-table-of-contents li li {\r\n\tfont-size: 0.95em;\r\n\tfont-weight: normal;\r\n\tline-height: 1.4;\r\n}\n\n.tc-table-of-contents li li a {\r\n\tfont-weight: normal;\r\n}\n\n.tc-table-of-contents li li li {\r\n\tfont-size: 0.95em;\r\n\tfont-weight: 200;\r\n\tline-height: 1.5;\r\n}\n\n.tc-table-of-contents li li li a {\r\n\tfont-weight: bold;\r\n}\n\n.tc-table-of-contents li li li li {\r\n\tfont-size: 0.95em;\r\n\tfont-weight: 200;\r\n}\n\n.tc-tabbed-table-of-contents {\r\n\tdisplay: -webkit-flex;\r\n\tdisplay: flex;\r\n}\n\n.tc-tabbed-table-of-contents .tc-table-of-contents {\r\n\tz-index: 100;\r\n\tdisplay: inline-block;\r\n\tpadding-left: 1em;\r\n\tmax-width: 50%;\r\n\t-webkit-flex: 0 0 auto;\r\n\tflex: 0 0 auto;\r\n\tbackground: <<colour tab-background>>;\r\n\tborder-left: 1px solid <<colour tab-border>>;\r\n\tborder-top: 1px solid <<colour tab-border>>;\r\n\tborder-bottom: 1px solid <<colour tab-border>>;\r\n}\n\n.tc-tabbed-table-of-contents .tc-table-of-contents .toc-item > a,\r\n.tc-tabbed-table-of-contents .tc-table-of-contents .toc-item-selected > a {\r\n\tdisplay: block;\r\n\tpadding: 0.12em 1em 0.12em 0.25em;\r\n}\n\n.tc-tabbed-table-of-contents .tc-table-of-contents .toc-item > a {\r\n\tborder-top: 1px solid <<colour tab-background>>;\r\n\tborder-left: 1px solid <<colour tab-background>>;\r\n\tborder-bottom: 1px solid <<colour tab-background>>;\r\n}\n\n.tc-tabbed-table-of-contents .tc-table-of-contents .toc-item > a:hover {\r\n\ttext-decoration: none;\r\n\tborder-top: 1px solid <<colour tab-border>>;\r\n\tborder-left: 1px solid <<colour tab-border>>;\r\n\tborder-bottom: 1px solid <<colour tab-border>>;\r\n\tbackground: <<colour tab-border>>;\r\n}\n\n.tc-tabbed-table-of-contents .tc-table-of-contents .toc-item-selected > a {\r\n\tborder-top: 1px solid <<colour tab-border>>;\r\n\tborder-left: 1px solid <<colour tab-border>>;\r\n\tborder-bottom: 1px solid <<colour tab-border>>;\r\n\tbackground: <<colour background>>;\r\n\tmargin-right: -1px;\r\n}\n\n.tc-tabbed-table-of-contents .tc-table-of-contents .toc-item-selected > a:hover {\r\n\ttext-decoration: none;\r\n}\n\n.tc-tabbed-table-of-contents .tc-tabbed-table-of-contents-content {\r\n\tdisplay: inline-block;\r\n\tvertical-align: top;\r\n\tpadding-left: 1.5em;\r\n\tpadding-right: 1.5em;\r\n\tborder: 1px solid <<colour tab-border>>;\r\n\t-webkit-flex: 1 0 50%;\r\n\tflex: 1 0 50%;\r\n}\n\n/*\r\n** Dirty indicator\r\n*/\n\nbody.tc-dirty span.tc-dirty-indicator, body.tc-dirty span.tc-dirty-indicator svg {\r\n\tfill: <<colour dirty-indicator>>;\r\n\tcolor: <<colour dirty-indicator>>;\r\n}\n\n/*\r\n** File inputs\r\n*/\n\n.tc-file-input-wrapper {\r\n\tposition: relative;\r\n\toverflow: hidden;\r\n\tdisplay: inline-block;\r\n\tvertical-align: middle;\r\n}\n\n.tc-file-input-wrapper input[type=file] {\r\n\tposition: absolute;\r\n\ttop: 0;\r\n\tleft: 0;\r\n\tright: 0;\r\n\tbottom: 0;\r\n\tfont-size: 999px;\r\n\tmax-width: 100%;\r\n\tmax-height: 100%;\r\n\tfilter: alpha(opacity=0);\r\n\topacity: 0;\r\n\toutline: none;\r\n\tbackground: white;\r\n\tcursor: pointer;\r\n\tdisplay: inline-block;\r\n}\n\n/*\r\n** Thumbnail macros\r\n*/\n\n.tc-thumbnail-wrapper {\r\n\tposition: relative;\r\n\tdisplay: inline-block;\r\n\tmargin: 6px;\r\n\tvertical-align: 3px;\r\n}\n\n.tc-thumbnail-image svg,\r\n.tc-thumbnail-image img {\r\n\tfilter: alpha(opacity=1);\r\n\topacity: 1;\r\n    min-width: 100%;\r\n    min-height: 100%;\r\n    max-width: 0.8;\r\n}\n\n.tc-thumbnail-background {\r\n\tposition: absolute;\r\n\tborder-radius: 3px;\r\n}\n\n.tc-thumbnail-icon svg,\r\n.tc-thumbnail-icon img {\r\n\twidth: 3em;\r\n\theight: 3em;\r\n\t<<filter \"drop-shadow(2px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.3))\">>\r\n}\n\n.tc-thumbnail-wrapper:hover .tc-thumbnail-icon svg,\r\n.tc-thumbnail-wrapper:hover .tc-thumbnail-icon img {\r\n\tfill: #fff;\r\n\t<<filter \"drop-shadow(3px 3px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.6))\">>\r\n}\n\n.tc-thumbnail-icon {\r\n\tposition: absolute;\r\n\ttop: 0;\r\n\tleft: 0;\r\n\tright: 0;\r\n\tbottom: 0;\r\n\tdisplay: {\r\n\tposition: absolute;\r\n\tbackground-color: #777;\r\n\tcolor: #fff;\r\n\ttext-align: center;\r\n\tbottom: 0;\r\n\twidth: 100%;\r\n\tfilter: alpha(opacity=0.9);\r\n\topacity: 0.9;\r\n\tline-height: 1.4;\r\n\tborder-bottom-left-radius: 3px;\r\n\tborder-bottom-right-radius: 3px;\r\n}\n\n.tc-thumbnail-wrapper:hover .tc-thumbnail-caption {\r\n\tfilter: alpha(opacity=1);\r\n\topacity: 1;\r\n}\n\n/*\r\n** Errors\r\n*/\n\n.tc-error {\r\n\tbackground: #f00;\r\n\tcolor: #fff;\r\n}\r\n"

        "$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/reset": {
            "title": "$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/reset",
            "type": "text/plain",
            "text": "/*! normalize.css v3.0.0 | MIT License | git.io/normalize */\n\n/**\r\n * 1. Set default font family to sans-serif.\r\n * 2. Prevent iOS text size adjust after orientation change, without disabling\r\n *    user zoom.\r\n */\n\nhtml {\r\n  font-family: sans-serif; /* 1 */\r\n  -ms-text-size-adjust: 100%; /* 2 */\r\n  -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%; /* 2 */\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Remove default margin.\r\n */\n\nbody {\r\n  margin: 0;\r\n}\n\n/* HTML5 display definitions\r\n   ========================================================================== */\n\n/**\r\n * Correct `block` display not defined in IE 8/9.\r\n */\n\narticle,\r\naside,\r\ndetails,\r\nfigcaption,\r\nfigure,\r\nfooter,\r\nheader,\r\nhgroup,\r\nmain,\r\nnav,\r\nsection,\r\nsummary {\r\n  display: block;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * 1. Correct `inline-block` display not defined in IE 8/9.\r\n * 2. Normalize vertical alignment of `progress` in Chrome, Firefox, and Opera.\r\n */\n\naudio,\r\ncanvas,\r\nprogress,\r\nvideo {\r\n  display: inline-block; /* 1 */\r\n  vertical-align: baseline; /* 2 */\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Prevent modern browsers from displaying `audio` without controls.\r\n * Remove excess height in iOS 5 devices.\r\n */\n\naudio:not([controls]) {\r\n  display: none;\r\n  height: 0;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Address `[hidden]` styling not present in IE 8/9.\r\n * Hide the `template` element in IE, Safari, and Firefox < 22.\r\n */\n\n[hidden],\r\ntemplate {\r\n  display: none;\r\n}\n\n/* Links\r\n   ========================================================================== */\n\n/**\r\n * Remove the gray background color from active links in IE 10.\r\n */\n\na {\r\n  background: transparent;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Improve readability when focused and also mouse hovered in all browsers.\r\n */\n\na:active,\r\na:hover {\r\n  outline: 0;\r\n}\n\n/* Text-level semantics\r\n   ========================================================================== */\n\n/**\r\n * Address styling not present in IE 8/9, Safari 5, and Chrome.\r\n */\n\nabbr[title] {\r\n  border-bottom: 1px dotted;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Address style set to `bolder` in Firefox 4+, Safari 5, and Chrome.\r\n */\n\nb,\r\nstrong {\r\n  font-weight: bold;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Address styling not present in Safari 5 and Chrome.\r\n */\n\ndfn {\r\n  font-style: italic;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Address variable `h1` font-size and margin within `section` and `article`\r\n * contexts in Firefox 4+, Safari 5, and Chrome.\r\n */\n\nh1 {\r\n  font-size: 2em;\r\n  margin: 0.67em 0;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Address styling not present in IE 8/9.\r\n */\n\nmark {\r\n  background: #ff0;\r\n  color: #000;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Address inconsistent and variable font size in all browsers.\r\n */\n\nsmall {\r\n  font-size: 80%;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Prevent `sub` and `sup` affecting `line-height` in all browsers.\r\n */\n\nsub,\r\nsup {\r\n  font-size: 75%;\r\n  line-height: 0;\r\n  position: relative;\r\n  vertical-align: baseline;\r\n}\n\nsup {\r\n  top: -0.5em;\r\n}\n\nsub {\r\n  bottom: -0.25em;\r\n}\n\n/* Embedded content\r\n   ========================================================================== */\n\n/**\r\n * Remove border when inside `a` element in IE 8/9.\r\n */\n\nimg {\r\n  border: 0;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Correct overflow displayed oddly in IE 9.\r\n */\n\nsvg:not(:root) {\r\n  overflow: hidden;\r\n}\n\n/* Grouping content\r\n   ========================================================================== */\n\n/**\r\n * Address margin not present in IE 8/9 and Safari 5.\r\n */\n\nfigure {\r\n  margin: 1em 40px;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Address differences between Firefox and other browsers.\r\n */\n\nhr {\r\n  -moz-box-sizing: content-box;\r\n  box-sizing: content-box;\r\n  height: 0;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Contain overflow in all browsers.\r\n */\n\npre {\r\n  overflow: auto;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Address odd `em`-unit font size rendering in all browsers.\r\n */\n\ncode,\r\nkbd,\r\npre,\r\nsamp {\r\n  font-family: monospace, monospace;\r\n  font-size: 1em;\r\n}\n\n/* Forms\r\n   ========================================================================== */\n\n/**\r\n * Known limitation: by default, Chrome and Safari on OS X allow very limited\r\n * styling of `select`, unless a `border` property is set.\r\n */\n\n/**\r\n * 1. Correct color not being inherited.\r\n *    Known issue: affects color of disabled elements.\r\n * 2. Correct font properties not being inherited.\r\n * 3. Address margins set differently in Firefox 4+, Safari 5, and Chrome.\r\n */\n\nbutton,\r\ninput,\r\noptgroup,\r\nselect,\r\ntextarea {\r\n  color: inherit; /* 1 */\r\n  font: inherit; /* 2 */\r\n  margin: 0; /* 3 */\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Address `overflow` set to `hidden` in IE 8/9/10.\r\n */\n\nbutton {\r\n  overflow: visible;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Address inconsistent `text-transform` inheritance for `button` and `select`.\r\n * All other form control elements do not inherit `text-transform` values.\r\n * Correct `button` style inheritance in Firefox, IE 8+, and Opera\r\n * Correct `select` style inheritance in Firefox.\r\n */\n\nbutton,\r\nselect {\r\n  text-transform: none;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * 1. Avoid the WebKit bug in Android 4.0.* where (2) destroys native `audio`\r\n *    and `video` controls.\r\n * 2. Correct inability to style clickable `input` types in iOS.\r\n * 3. Improve usability and consistency of cursor style between image-type\r\n *    `input` and others.\r\n */\n\nbutton,\r\nhtml input[type=\"button\"], /* 1 */\r\ninput[type=\"reset\"],\r\ninput[type=\"submit\"] {\r\n  -webkit-appearance: button; /* 2 */\r\n  cursor: pointer; /* 3 */\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Re-set default cursor for disabled elements.\r\n */\n\nbutton[disabled],\r\nhtml input[disabled] {\r\n  cursor: default;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Remove inner padding and border in Firefox 4+.\r\n */\n\nbutton::-moz-focus-inner,\r\ninput::-moz-focus-inner {\r\n  border: 0;\r\n  padding: 0;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Address Firefox 4+ setting `line-height` on `input` using `!important` in\r\n * the UA stylesheet.\r\n */\n\ninput {\r\n  line-height: normal;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * It's recommended that you don't attempt to style these elements.\r\n * Firefox's implementation doesn't respect box-sizing, padding, or width.\r\n *\r\n * 1. Address box sizing set to `content-box` in IE 8/9/10.\r\n * 2. Remove excess padding in IE 8/9/10.\r\n */\n\ninput[type=\"checkbox\"],\r\ninput[type=\"radio\"] {\r\n  box-sizing: border-box; /* 1 */\r\n  padding: 0; /* 2 */\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Fix the cursor style for Chrome's increment/decrement buttons. For certain\r\n * `font-size` values of the `input`, it causes the cursor style of the\r\n * decrement button to change from `default` to `text`.\r\n */\n\ninput[type=\"number\"]::-webkit-inner-spin-button,\r\ninput[type=\"number\"]::-webkit-outer-spin-button {\r\n  height: auto;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * 1. Address `appearance` set to `searchfield` in Safari 5 and Chrome.\r\n * 2. Address `box-sizing` set to `border-box` in Safari 5 and Chrome\r\n *    (include `-moz` to future-proof).\r\n */\n\ninput[type=\"search\"] {\r\n  -webkit-appearance: textfield; /* 1 */\r\n  -moz-box-sizing: content-box;\r\n  -webkit-box-sizing: content-box; /* 2 */\r\n  box-sizing: content-box;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Remove inner padding and search cancel button in Safari and Chrome on OS X.\r\n * Safari (but not Chrome) clips the cancel button when the search input has\r\n * padding (and `textfield` appearance).\r\n */\n\ninput[type=\"search\"]::-webkit-search-cancel-button,\r\ninput[type=\"search\"]::-webkit-search-decoration {\r\n  -webkit-appearance: none;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Define consistent border, margin, and padding.\r\n */\n\nfieldset {\r\n  border: 1px solid #c0c0c0;\r\n  margin: 0 2px;\r\n  padding: 0.35em 0.625em 0.75em;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * 1. Correct `color` not being inherited in IE 8/9.\r\n * 2. Remove padding so people aren't caught out if they zero out fieldsets.\r\n */\n\nlegend {\r\n  border: 0; /* 1 */\r\n  padding: 0; /* 2 */\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Remove default vertical scrollbar in IE 8/9.\r\n */\n\ntextarea {\r\n  overflow: auto;\r\n}\n\n/**\r\n * Don't inherit the `font-weight` (applied by a rule above).\r\n * NOTE: the default cannot safely be changed in Chrome and Safari on OS X.\r\n */\n\noptgroup {\r\n  font-weight: bold;\r\n}\n\n/* Tables\r\n   ========================================================================== */\n\n/**\r\n * Remove most spacing between table cells.\r\n */\n\ntable {\r\n  border-collapse: collapse;\r\n  border-spacing: 0;\r\n}\n\ntd,\r\nth {\r\n  padding: 0;\r\n}\r\n"
        },

        "$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/themetweaks": {
            "title": "$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/themetweaks",
            "tags": "$:/tags/ControlPanel/Appearance",
            "caption": "Theme Tweaks",
            "text": "\\define backgroundimage-dropdown()\r\n<div class=\"tc-drop-down-wrapper\">\r\n<$button popup=<<qualify \"$:/state/popup/themetweaks/backgroundimage\">> class=\"tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-dropdown\">{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}}</$button>\r\n<$reveal state=<<qualify \"$:/state/popup/themetweaks/backgroundimage\">> type=\"popup\" position=\"belowleft\" text=\"\" default=\"\">\r\n<div class=\"tc-drop-down\">\r\n<$linkcatcher to=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/backgroundimage\">\r\n<$link to=\"\">\r\n(none)\r\n</$link>\r\n<hr>\r\n<$list filter=\"[all[shadows+tiddlers]is[image]] -[type[application/pdf]] +[sort[title]]\">\r\n<$link to={{!!title}}>\r\n<$transclude/> <$view field=\"title\"/>\r\n</$link>\r\n</$list>\r\n</$linkcatcher>\r\n</div>\r\n</$reveal>\r\n</div>\r\n\\end\n\n\\define backgroundimageattachment-dropdown()\r\n<$select tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/backgroundimageattachment\" default=\"scroll\">\r\n<option value=\"scroll\">Scroll with tiddlers</option>\r\n<option value=\"fixed\">Fixed to window</option>\r\n</$select>\r\n\\end\n\n\\define backgroundimagesize-dropdown()\r\n<$select tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/backgroundimagesize\" default=\"scroll\">\r\n<option value=\"auto\">Auto</option>\r\n<option value=\"cover\">Cover</option>\r\n<option value=\"contain\">Contain</option>\r\n</$select>\r\n\\end\n\nYou can tweak certain aspects of the ''Vanilla'' theme.\n\n! Options\n\n|[[Sidebar layout|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/sidebarlayout]] |<$select tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/sidebarlayout\"><option value=\"fixed-fluid\">Fixed story, fluid sidebar</option><option value=\"fluid-fixed\">Fluid story, fixed sidebar</option></$select> |\r\n|[[Sticky titles|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/stickytitles]]<br>//Causes tiddler titles to \"stick\" to the top of the browser window. Caution: Does not work at all with Chrome, and causes some layout issues in Firefox// |<$select tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/stickytitles\"><option value=\"no\">No</option><option value=\"yes\">Yes</option></$select> |\n\n! Settings\n\n|[[Font family|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/fontfamily]] |<$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/fontfamily\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/> | |\r\n|[[Code font family|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/codefontfamily]] |<$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/codefontfamily\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/> | |\r\n|[[Page background image|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/backgroundimage]] |<$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/backgroundimage\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/> |<<backgroundimage-dropdown>> |\r\n|[[Page background image attachment |$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/backgroundimageattachment]] |<<backgroundimageattachment-dropdown>> | |\r\n|[[Page background image size |$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/settings/backgroundimagesize]] |<<backgroundimagesize-dropdown>> | |\n\n! Sizes\n\n|[[Font size|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/fontsize]] |<$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/fontsize\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/> |\r\n|[[Line height|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/lineheight]] |<$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/lineheight\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/> |\r\n|[[Font size for tiddler body|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/bodyfontsize]] |<$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/bodyfontsize\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/> |\r\n|[[Line height for tiddler body|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/bodylineheight]] |<$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/bodylineheight\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/> |\r\n|[[Story left position|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyleft]]<br>//how far the left margin of the story river<br>(tiddler area) is from the left of the page// |^<$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyleft\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/> |\r\n|[[Story top position|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storytop]]<br>//how far the top margin of the story river<br>is from the top of the page// |^<$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storytop\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/> |\r\n|[[Story right|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyright]]<br>//how far the left margin of the sidebar <br>is from the left of the page// |^<$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyright\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/> |\r\n|[[Story width|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storywidth]]<br>//the overall width of the story river// |^<$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storywidth\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/> |\r\n|[[Tiddler width|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/tiddlerwidth]]<br>//within the story river//<br> |^<$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/tiddlerwidth\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/> |\r\n|[[Sidebar breakpoint|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint]]<br>//the minimum page width at which the story<br>river and sidebar will appear side by side// |^<$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/> |\r\n|[[Sidebar width|$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarwidth]]<br>//the width of the sidebar in fluid-fixed layout// |^<$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarwidth\" default=\"\" tag=\"input\"/> |\r\n"
        }
    }
}






!! Done

; Dave Gifford's request
: [[Cross-indexing By 4 different Criteria — Using Fields|https://groups.google.com/d/msg/tiddlywiki/Jy4-aOoEi5U/Dt9VxPPWFf0J]]
: http://giffmex.org/experiments/history.crossindexing.html
: https://groups.google.com/d/msg/tiddlywiki/Jy4-aOoEi5U/uWDn3qvKNuAJ
<<<
# a tag-category by other category-tags
#* this is the only one ''xlist'' currently does
# a field-category by category-tags
# a tag-category by category-fields
# a field-category by other category-fields
#* this seems to be what ''Giffmex'' is after
<<<
























The following example lists all [[Publications]] by publication categories...

`<<xlist filter:"[all[]]" groups:"[tag[Publications]sort[]]">>`

> <<xlist filter:"[all[]]" groups:"[tag[Publications]sort[]]">>

Same goes for grouping by the discrete values of a field, e.g. ''topic'':

`<<xlist filter:"[all[]]" each:topic>>`

> <<xlist filter:"[all[]]" each:topic>>






























Have a look at tiddler [[Journals]]. Really, open it and look at its text. Neither does it have a `list` field defined, nor does it come with any markup. So, what's going on?

It implements a [[Conditional ViewTemplate Section|http://tb5.tiddlyspot.com/#Conditional%20ViewTemplate%20Section]] as [[explained in this post|https://groups.google.com/d/msg/tiddlywiki/EzypDKdUOFE/JPn7pP8FwqAJ]]...

```
{{Journals||$:/.tb/ui/ViewTemplate/xlists}}
```

> {{Journals||$:/.tb/ui/ViewTemplate/xlists}}

Below, a [[Shortcut Macro]] is used in the template <<source [[$:/.tb/ui/ViewTemplate/xlists]]>>






<<xlist-published Publications>>






<dl class="xlist">
<$list filter="[tag[Publications]sort[]]">
<dt><$link to=<<currentTiddler>>><$view field=title/></$link></dt>
<$list filter="[tag[Topics]sort[]]" variable=topic>
<$list filter="[tag<currentTiddler>]+[tag<topic>]+[limit[1]]">
<dd><$link to=<<topic>>><$view tiddler=<<topic>> field=title/></$link></dd>
</$list>
</$list>
</$list>
</dl>






<dl class="xlist">
<$list filter="[tag[Topics]sort[]]">
<dt><$link to=<<currentTiddler>>><$view field=title/></$link></dt>
<$list filter="[tag[Publications]sort[]]" variable=pub>
<$list filter="[tag<currentTiddler>]+[tag<pub>]+[limit[1]]">
<dd><$link to=<<pub>>><$view tiddler=<<pub>> field=title/></$link></dd>
</$list>
</$list>
</$list>
</dl>






The below example gets the categories from a list field called ''xlist'' at the tiddler [[Articles]].

```
''categories'': {{Articles!!xlist}}
<<xlist filter:"[tag[Articles]]" groups:"[list[Articles!!xlist]]">>
```

<<<
''categories'': {{Articles!!xlist}}
<<xlist filter:"[tag[Articles]]" groups:"[list[Articles!!xlist]]">>
<<<






Instead of matching the current tiddler as a tag, you can define a [[filter]].

Below, all [[Examples]] are listed, grouped by [[Parameters]] — as in the standard ''list'' field of [[Parameters]] — yet only those tagged [[sort]], i.e. showing how to use the [[sort]] parameter.

```
<$tiddler tiddler=Parameters>
<<xlist filter:"[[Examples]tagging[]]-[!tag[sort]]">>
</$tiddler>
```

<<<
<$tiddler tiddler=Parameters>
<<xlist filter:"[[Examples]tagging[]]-[!tag[sort]]">>
</$tiddler>
<<<

Here's the equivalent using the [[groups]] parameter...

```
<<xlist filter:"[[Examples]tagging[]]-[!tag[sort]]"
groups:"[list[Parameters]]">>
```

> <<xlist filter:"[[Examples]tagging[]]-[!tag[sort]]" groups:"[list[Parameters]]">>






Here is an example to list items with ''published'' dates:

```
<$tiddler tiddler=Business>
<<xlist template:[[$:/.tb/templates/xlist-published]]>>
</$tiddler>
```

> <$tiddler tiddler=Business><<xlist template:[[$:/.tb/templates/xlist-published]]>></$tiddler>

The template <<source [[$:/.tb/templates/xlist-published]]>>












<<xlist>>


















<dl>
<<list-search
filter:"[tag[Filters]]"
search:"search:description"
state: "$:/temp/list-search/examples"
template:"$:/.tb/templates/plugin-list">>
</dl>






Based on [[list category items with categories @ filters|http://filters.tiddlyspot.com/#list%20category%20items%20with%20categories]], here is how you can iterate all [[Publications]] and have them list their [[Topics]] using a list item template [[$:/.tb/templates/flat-list]].

```
<$tiddler tiddler="Topics">
<$list filter="[all[current]tagging[]tagging[]sort[title]]" variable="item" template="$:/.tb/templates/flat-list">
</$tiddler>
```

<<<
<$tiddler tiddler="Topics">
<$list filter="[all[current]tagging[]tagging[]sort[title]]" variable="item" template="$:/.tb/templates/flat-list">
</$tiddler>
<<<






To apply it to another tiddler, wrap the ''xlist'' macro with the [[TiddlerWidget|http://tiddlywiki.com/#TiddlerWidget]], e.g.:

```
<$tiddler tiddler="Business">
<<xlist>>
</$tiddler>
```

> <$tiddler tiddler="Business"><<xlist>></$tiddler>

```
''categories'': {{Business!!list}}
```

> ''categories'': {{Business!!list}}

Here's the equivalent using both the [[filter]] and the [[groups]] parameter...

```
<<xlist filter:"[tag[Business]]" groups:"[list[Business]]">>
```

> <<xlist filter:"[tag[Business]]" groups:"[list[Business]]">>












The following example lists all [[Publications]] by publication categories...

`<<xlist filter:"[all[]]" groups:"[tag[Publications]sort[]]" link:"no">>`

> <<xlist filter:"[all[]]" groups:"[tag[Publications]sort[]]" link:"no">>

Same goes for grouping by the discrete values of a field, e.g. ''topic'':

`<<xlist filter:"[all[]]" each:topic link:"no">>`

> <<xlist filter:"[all[]]" each:topic link:"no">>






Drag into your wiki, save, reload: [[$:/plugins/tobibeer/xlist]]






Define the [[sort]] parameter in the form of a [[filter|http://tiddlywiki.com/#FilterOperator%3A%20limit]]. The example below lists all tiddlers grouped by [[Publications]] for the topic [[Business]], sorted by the ''published'' field in descending order, thus newest first, using a custom [[template|Custom Item Template]].

```
<$tiddler tiddler=Business>
<<xlist
template:[[$:/.tb/templates/xlist-published]]
sort:"[!sort[published]]">>
</$tiddler>
```

> <$tiddler tiddler=Business><<xlist template:[[$:/.tb/templates/xlist-published]] sort:"[!sort[published]]">></$tiddler>

Here's the template <<source "$:/.tb/templates/xlist-published">>


















If no group filter is defined, the ''xlist'' macro groups titles by categories specified in the tiddler's list field.






<dl>
<<list-search
filter:"[tag[Macros]]"
search:"search:description"
state: "$:/temp/list-search/examples"
template:"$:/.tb/templates/plugin-list">>
</dl>






You can use the ''xlist'' macro to...

* [[filter]] tiddlers where a given field is of a defined value
* grouped by categories derived from [[each]] distinct value of a category field

The below example gets all tiddlers where the field ''topic'' is set to [[Business]] also having the ''publication'' field set to one of the available values...

```
<<xlist filter:"[topic[Business]]" each:publication>>
```

<<<
<<xlist filter:"[topic[Business]]" each:publication>>
<<<

The next example gets all tiddlers where the field ''publication'' is set to [[Journals]] also having the ''topic'' field set to one of the available values...

```
<<xlist filter:"[publication[Journals]]" each:topic>>
```

<<<
<<xlist filter:"[publication[Journals]]" each:topic>>
<<<






You can use the ''xlist'' macro to...

* [[filter]] tiddlers where a field is of a defined value
* while using tags from a category list or filter expression as [[groups]]

```
<$tiddler tiddler=Business>
<<xlist filter:"[topic[Business]]">>
</$tiddler>
```

<<<
<$tiddler tiddler=Business>
<<xlist filter:"[topic[Business]]">>
</$tiddler>
<<<

This example is equivalent to the above, only just the categories are derived using the equivalent filter.

```
<<xlist filter:"[topic[Business]]" groups:"[list[Business]]">>
```

<<<
<<xlist groups:"[list[Business]]" filter:"[topic[Business]]">>
<<<






You can use the ''xlist'' macro to...

* [[filter]] tiddlers tagged with the ''current tiddler''
* by grouping into categories derived from [[each]] distinct value of a category field

The example below gets all tiddlers tagged [[Articles]] where the field topic matches one of the available categories for the ''topic'' field...

```
<$tiddler tiddler=Articles>
<<xlist each:topic>>
</$tiddler>
```

<<<
<$tiddler tiddler=Articles>
<<xlist each:topic>>
</$tiddler>
<<<

This example gets all tiddlers tagged [[Economics]] where the field ''publication'' matches one of the available categories for the ''publication'' field...

```
<$tiddler tiddler=Economics>
<<xlist each:publication>>
</$tiddler>
```

<<<
<$tiddler tiddler=Economics>
<<xlist each:publication>>
</$tiddler>
<<<






You can use the ''xlist'' macro to..

* find tiddlers tagged with the current tiddler
* grouped by category tags from a [[list]] or [[filter]] expression

This is the default behavior.






```
<$tiddler tiddler="Economics">
<<xlist>>
</$tiddler>
```

> {{Economics}}

Reads the categories from the tiddler's list field, here from the tiddler [[Economics]]:

```
''categories'': {{Economics!!list}}
```

> ''categories'': {{Economics!!list}}






The following optional parameters can be specified for the ''xlist'' macro:

<table class="td-top">
<tr>
<th>#</th>
<th>Field</th>
<th>Description</th>
<th>Default</th>
</tr>
<$list filter="[list[]]">
<tr>
<td><<iterator>></td>
<td><$link to=<<currentTiddler>>><$view field=title/></$link></td>
<td>{{!!summary}}</td>
<td>{{!!default}}</td>
</tr>
</$list>
</table>






<dl>
<<list-search
filter:"[tag[Plugins]]"
search:"search:description"
state: "$:/temp/list-search/examples"
template:"$:/.tb/templates/plugin-list">>
</dl>






<<tabs
"[all[current]tagging[]]"
default: "Articles"
state: "$:/state/tabs/xlist/publication"
template:[[$:/.tb/templates/tab/xlist/publication]]>>






Have a look at the text of the tiddler <<source "Business">>

The below macro that it calls uses a [[groups]] filter via tagging, an item [[template]] and a custom [[sort]] parameter, see <<source [[$:/.tb/macros/xlist-published]]>>

!! Demo

```
{{Business}}
```

> {{Business}}












The following examples use the [[template]] parameter to define custom tab contents for the [[tabs macro|http://tiddlywiki.com/#TabsMacro]], each iterating category tiddlers tagging to them while showing a grouped category listing of the other.

; [[Topics]]
: topic tabs with items grouped by [[Publications]]
: template: [[$:/.tb/templates/tab/xlist/topic]]
; [[Publications]]
: publication tabs with items grouped by [[Topics]]
: template: [[$:/.tb/templates/tab/xlist/publication]]

!! [[Topics]] Demo

```
{{Topics}}
```

> {{Topics}}

How it is done for <<source Topics>>






If you don't want to use the standard ''list'' field or a [[custom list field|Custom Category List]], you can specify the [[groups]] parameter to use something like ''tagging'' instead.

!! Example

Groups categories for all [[Journals]] as tiddlers tagging to [[Topics]] sorted by title.

```
<<xlist filter:"[tag[Journals]]" groups:"[tag[Topics]sort[]]">>
```

> <<xlist filter:"[tag[Journals]]" groups:"[tag[Topics]sort[]]">>

The equivalent using the tiddler widget...

```
<$tiddler tiddler=Journals>
<<xlist groups:"[tag[Topics]sort[]]">>
</$tiddler>
```

> <$tiddler tiddler=Journals><<xlist groups:"[tag[Topics]sort[]]">></$tiddler>








!! Template Variables

The following variables are exposed to the item template:

; `<<currentTiddler>>`
: the currently displayed tiddler in the group
; `<<currentGroup>>`
: with tags — the title of the group tag
: with [[each]] — a half baked filter expression
:: evaluate `<<xlist-each-title>>` using the list widget to get the real title, e.g:<div>

`<$list filter=<<xlist-each-title>>><$link><<currentTiddler>></$link></$list>`

`<$list filter=<<xlist-each-title>> variable=currentGroup><<currentGroup>></$list>`
</div>


















<<tabs
"[all[current]tagging[]]"
default:Economics
state: "$:/state/tabs/xlist/topic"
template:[[$:/.tb/templates/tab/xlist/topic]]>>






\define variant(tiddler)
<$tiddler tiddler="$tiddler$">
<$link><$view field=title/></$link><br>
@@color:grey;//{{!!summary}}//@@
</$tiddler>
\end

As you can relate tiddlers both via tags as well as via fields, ''xlist'' allows you to crosslist based on ''tags'' or ''fields'' in any of the four possible combinations...

<table class="td-top">
<tr>
<th rowspan="2" colspan="2"></th>
<th colspan="2">Group Categories</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<th>Tags</th>
<th>Field Values</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<th rowspan="2">Match</th>
<th>Tag</th>
<td><<variant [[Match Tag — Group Tags]]>></td>
<td><<variant [[Match Tag — Each Field Value]]>></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<th>Field Value</th>
<td><<variant [[Match Field — Group Tags]]>></td>
<td><<variant [[Match Field — Each Field Value]]>></td>
</tr>
</table>






The ''xlist'' macro crosslists tiddlers with relations to two categories. Imagine the following [[topic|Topics]] tags, [[publication|Publications]]-type tags, and then publications tagging to both:

<table class="start">
<tr>
<th>[[Topics]]</th>
<th>[[Publications]]</th>
<th>[[By Topics|Topics]]</th>
<th>[[By Publications|Publications]]</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><<list-links filter:"[tag[Topics]sort[title]]">></td>
<td><<list-links filter:"[tag[Publications]sort[title]]">></td>
<td>{{By Topics}}</td>
<td>{{By Publications}}</td>
</tr>
</table>

The [[xlist macro|$:/plugins/tobibeer/xlist]] lists tiddlers grouped by one category while also matching another. For example, to list a [[publication|Publications]] in the group [[Business > Journals|Business]], tag it — as you instinctively would — with both the topic category and the publication category, thus [[Business]] and [[Journals]].

A first [[example|Examples]]...

`<<xlist filter:"[tag[Business]]" groups:"[tag[Publications]sort[]]">>`

> <<xlist filter:"[tag[Business]]" groups:"[tag[Publications]sort[]]">>
